title: rengar tattoo
body: So I started my Lol sleeve. First up was rengar my very first main. Riot please send me plushy or money to finish it hahahahaha. But don't. But do. But yeah. Thank you riot for saving me

replies.body: Either Kalista or Leona. Full sleeve full of mains and characters I really enjoy

Nah man. I'm a uni student not made of money haha
but that sad summoner waste all their mana and only flash bard 1cm not to mention teleport and barrier... {{champion:432}} IS STILL OBESE DO HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA >:}D
you need khazix rengars sworn enemy XD
I might. I get my mains and shit haha. Gonna get a teemo shroom on my elbow haha

Nice tattoo! 
We love Riot!

edit WHY DO HEARTS NOT WORK <  3
That's a serious dedication to Rengar but you know the left eye is yellow not red?
Yeah I know. Made some minor tweeks to him. Preferred the red in his eye for some reason hha
